m_szDocTitle: Capitol Hyundai Of San Jose Celebrates First Fuel Cell Customer Delivery In Northern California
m_szDocSumamry: May 02, 2016, 13:50 ET      from Hyundai Motor America SAN JOSE, Calif., May 2, 2016 /PRNewswire/ --Â Capitol Hyundai of San Jose, California, a proud member of the Del Grande Dealer Group, delivered the first zero-emissions Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell hydrogen electric vehicle in the Northern California region today. Capitol Hyundai is the fifth qualified dealer for Hyundai's Tucson Fuel Cell, and the first Hyundai fuel cell dealer in Northern California. Hyundai was the first manufacturer in the U.S. to offer consumers the opportunity to lease a mass-produced fuel cell vehicle, the zero-emission
